title: UI Fails to load when game pops

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
30 Minute ban because your game failed to load? This is really unfair... It's happened multiple times

Specs:

i7 7700k
GTX 1080
16GB Ram
Windows 10

replies.body: Hmmm yea it looks like something definitely went wrong with your client. It's best to make sure you fix that up before hopping into another queue. Run a quick repair through the client options, and then check out the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974).

me too. after i click the confirm button it takes a few mins to show that im in queue,And it also takes a long time to enter the chat room, everytime i have to supp cuz everyone has called their role. I hate this so much .
